chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Queen Talana, p. 728—Queen of Andor during Aviendha's fifth step through the columns of Rhuidean (the second time). She is middle-aged, with deep lustrous hair. She is not very pretty, but very regal. The Seanchan plan to kill her. She is Elayne's granddaughter. See also Aviendha; Oncala; Trakand, Elayne.
